frameStruct.name: FoodOrder
frameStruct.helpPrompt: Enter your order consisting of main and side dish a drink and wether or not it is to go

slotStruct.name: MainDish
slotStruct.query: Which main dish do you want

slotStruct.name: SideDish
slotStruct.query: Which side dish do you want

slotStruct.name: Drink
slotStruct.query: What do you want to drink

slotStruct.name: ToGo
slotStruct.query: Is that to go or for eating here

grammar.name: mainDish
grammar.value: root $input;$input = pasta | pizza | burger | curry | steak;

grammar.name: sideDish
grammar.value: root $input;$input = fries | french fries | baked potato | salad | wedges | curly fries;

grammar.name: drink
grammar.value: root $input;$input = wine | cola | water | beer | coffee | soda;

grammar.name: toGo
grammar.value: root $input;$input = to go | to eat here | here;
